name: Clue Chronicles: Fatal Illusion
description:
Welcome to Fatal Illusion, Episode I of the Clue Chronicles Mystery Series; all expansive, richly detailed world where YOU actually solve the mystery!

It's New Year's Eve 1938. On board the parade yacht of the wealthy and eccentric Ian Masque, you find yourself part of a "select" group of guests invited to an "unusual" New Year's Eve party. Each guest has a story to tell but their connection to you and to each other remains hidden. Something strange is bound to happen, and everyone is a suspect.
